144.heading: Blondes.

145.heading: Blondes.
145.title: "He's Home Right Now Cooking Dinner"
145.author: Young & Drake
145.appears_in: p. 103 in Battered Husbands (Redondo Beach, CA : H. Gregory Associates, 1991).
notes: Summary: Blondie's friend has three degrees and runs a corporation, and Blondie's impressed: I guess we've seen the last of 'dumb blondes.' Her friend says no, she's married to one.

146.heading: Blondes.
146.title: "Miss Atomic Blonde of 1946"

notes: Summary: The winner of the contest (the only natural blonde) is revealed.

147.heading: Blondes.
147.title: "Nick Raider, Squadra Omicidi"
147.author: di Claudio Nizzi ; disegni di Bruno Ramella ; lettering di Diana Rocchi
notes: SUMMARY: Afraid that his blonde daughter will marry a Black man, Papa hires thugs to teach the boyfriend a lesson and ends up having him killed. I. [Each creator] k. Blondes. k. African Americans. k. Thugs. k. Fathers. k. Daughters. k. Boyfriends. Call no.: PN6768.C55no.99

149.heading: Blondes.

notes: Summary: Didn't know he could play a violin, but he's playing second fiddle, falling for that two-timing blond.
